https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nXXN0JLPrZwpMBkq8yHhrs4yizE.jpg After a surprising breakup at home in Chicago, Amy decides that a change of scenery will do her well and impulsively decides to spend the holidays with her brother in Vienna. After taking ballroom dancing lessons with her dashing European dance partner, Lukas, Amy scores an invitation to dance competitively in the cityâ€™s biggest holiday ball, and also another shot at love. Best Christmas Ball Ever!
